summary: A texture replacer for Bandanas and Blindfolds of Skyrim, brought to you by brokefoot and volvaga0.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]What is this ?[/b]
[i]A texture replacement for Bandanas and Blindfolds of Skyrim[/i][/center][line]
First, go and download (if you haven\'t already) either or both of the following:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20900]Bandanas of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551]Blindfolds of Skyrim[/url]

Next, come back and choose one of three options to download:

-Replace Bandanas [i]and[/i] Blindfolds
-Replace Bandanas [i]only[/i]
-Replace Blindfolds [i]only[/i]

Please know that every variant will be updated with the new textures: [i]tied[/i] bandanas, as well as [i]left[/i] and [i]right[/i] blindfolds, not just the ones pictured.

Enjoy !
[line]
[i]*Mega thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3147615]volvaga0[/url] for allowing this texture replacement to be uploaded.[/i]


[b]Brokefoot\'s Mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717]Temptress Race[/url] with Psychos1s
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22168]Hmm What to Wear[/url] with Nightasy
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]UNP Mashup Compilation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31813]West Wind Combat Series: Assault Armor UNP UNPB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36780]West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage[/url]

[b]volvaga0\'s Mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11005]Angelic Halos and Demonic Horns[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20900]Bandanas of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12720]Blade of Olympus[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12322]Blades of Chaos and Athena[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551]Blindfolds of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9690]Dragon Ball Z Scouter[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13133]Dwemer Goggles and Scouter[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7804]ENB and FXAA Remover[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12788]Kratos WarPaint[/url]
author: brokefoot and volvaga0
